# gitlocal Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Opens a local git repository
provider "gitlocal" {
  path = "/path/to/repo"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `path` (String) Path to the root of the local git repository
